New Records: West Indies achieved a total of 218/5 in 20 overs, with Nicholas Pooran scoring 98 runs.
Key Match Events: Nicholas Pooran scored 98 runs, the highest individual score of the match.
West Indies bowlers took early wickets to restrict Afghanistan's total.
The match resulted in a 104-run victory for West Indies.
Post-Match Reflections: Rovman Powell, the West Indies captain, praised Nicholas Pooran's performance and the team's consistency.
Rashid Khan, the Afghanistan captain, acknowledged West Indies' strong performance and noted the impact of the strong breeze on the match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in St. Lucia, known for its excellent batting surfaces.
This was the 40th match of the World Cup 2024.
Others: Live updates on other matches were provided, including upcoming fixtures.
